If Y, the calculated cost rate can't exceed the base cost rate from the standard cost rate sheets.

Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

When including Company Holiday, the Actual Hours Included recognizes holidays defined in the Holiday Calendar. When submitting time entries for holidays, then exclude Company Holiday and include Absence.
If Y, the scheduled weekly hours are based on the worker primary position.
If entered, the worker scheduled hours for the week override the worker primary position information.
If N, worker schedule hours decrease by the number of absence hours logged that week.
If N, worker schedule hours decrease by the number of holidays occurring that week.
If Y, Total Hours includes Non-Project Time
Project Advanced Labor Costing Premium Time Tier Data

Actual_Hours_Included_Reference.description: When including Company Holiday, the Actual Hours Included recognizes holidays defined in the Holiday Calendar. When submitting time entries for holidays, then exclude Company Holiday and include Absence.

Base_Cost_Rate_Is_Max.description: If Y, the calculated cost rate can't exceed the base cost rate from the standard cost rate sheets.

Total_Hours_Included_Absence.description: If N, worker schedule hours decrease by the number of absence hours logged that week.

Total_Hours_Included_Company_Holiday.description: If N, worker schedule hours decrease by the number of holidays occurring that week.

Total_Hours_Included_Non-Project_Time.description: If Y, Total Hours includes Non-Project Time

Total_Hours_Included_Scheduled_Weekly_Ho.description: If Y, the scheduled weekly hours are based on the worker primary position.

Total_Hours_Included_Specified_Scheduled.description: If entered, the worker scheduled hours for the week override the worker primary position information.
